sources.title: An Old-Fashioned Girl
sources.description: Title: An Old-Fashioned Girl Summary: A young woman leaves home to earn money for the family, which is not the norm for her sex and social standing. Directed by: Arthur Dreifuss Actors: Gloria Jean, Jimmy Lydon, John Hubbard Production Company: Vinson Pictures Release Date: 19 January 1949 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A young woman leaves home to earn money for the family, which is not the norm for her sex and social standing.

metadata.Plot: A young woman leaves home to earn money for the family, which is not the norm for her sex and social standing.
metadata.Writer: Louisa May Alcott, Arthur Dreifuss, McElbert Moore
metadata.Actors: Gloria Jean, Jimmy Lydon, John Hubbard
